author: The Telegraph
title: Win a ski holiday to Nendaz
text: The luxury Etoiles de Montagne chalet ( etoilesdemontagne.com ) is a five-minute walk from the centre of Nendaz and close to its amenities. Sleeping up to 12, the recently built boutique property has six en-suite bedrooms with their own balconies and a spacious living room with a roaring fire and comfy sofas. An in-house chef is on hand to prepare gourmet meals accompanied by wine from the chalet’s own cellar. For relaxation, there’s an outdoor hot tub and cinema room with 600 films to choose from. And to make sure your holiday is fuss-free guests are driven to the gondola by the chalet’s own private transport. Nendaz is offering the chance to win a three-night break for two, with everything you need to enjoy the slopes. The prize includes three nights, including breakfast and dinner with wine, at the Etoiles de Montagne, along with two three-day 4 Vallées lift passes and all equipment hire. For more information visit nendaz.ch . Closing date for entries is December 5 2015. Terms and conditions apply. Online Form - Win a ski holiday to Nendaz Telegraphtravel
